en-AU.summary: Find local events in New Zealand
examplePhrases: What's on in Auckland this friday?
Find me jazz events in Wellington next week
en-AU.name: thelocal
en-AU.description:
Finds you local New Zealand events using eventfinda. 
Understands dates, event categories, dates, times, venues and NZ cities

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: 'Reset database' and 'Skip tutorial' are available as utterances for testing
